fields.message_rw: Umucungamari wu ruganda rwa '{{ existing.name }}' arahari.
fields.message_en_us: An accountant '{{ existing.name }}' already exists for this wetmill.
fields.message: An accountant '{{ existing.name }}' already exists for this wetmill.
fields.description: Error message when a user tries to register as an accountant when one already exists for a wet mill.

fields.message_rw: Warangije kwandikwa nka {{ existing.name }}, banza wohereza 'leave' kugirango wiyandikuze noneho wongere wiyandikishe.
fields.message_en_us: You are already registered with {{ existing.name }}, send 'leave' first to unregister and try again.
fields.message: You are already registered with {{ existing.name }}, send 'leave' first to unregister and try again.
fields.description: Error message when a CSP officer tries to register for two different CSPs.

fields.message_rw: Wamaze kwandikwa nk'umuntu ugura ikawa kuruganda CPO wa {{ existing.wetmill.name }} uruganda.  Ohereza 'leave' kuvamo utangire bushyasha.
fields.message_en_us: You are already registered as a CPO for the {{ existing.wetmill.name }} wetmill.  Send 'leave' to unregister and start over.
fields.message: You are already registered as a CPO for the {{ existing.wetmill.name }} wetmill.  Send 'leave' to unregister and start over.
fields.description: Error message when a CPO tries to register for a wet mill after already registering for another.

fields.message_rw: Numero ya telefoni yawe ntabwo yanditswe kugirango ibe yakoresha ubu buryo.
fields.message_en_us: Your mobile number is not registered with the system.
fields.message: Your mobile number is not registered with the system.
fields.description: Error message when a user sends 'leave' yet is unknown to the system.

fields.message_rw: Inomero ya telefoni yawe ntabwo yanditswe kugirango ube wakoresha ubu buryo.
fields.message_en_us: Your mobile number is not registered with the system.
fields.message: Your mobile number is not registered with the system.
fields.description: Error message sent when a user sends 'lang' but is unknown to the system

fields.message_rw: Wanditswe nkuumucunga mari w'uruganda rwa {{ acc.wetmill.name }}.
fields.message_en_us: You are registered as an accountant for the {{ acc.wetmill.name }} wet mill.
fields.message: You are registered as an accountant for the {{ acc.wetmill.name }} wet mill.
fields.description: Response to the 'who' command when a user is an accountant.

fields.message_rw: Wanditswe nka Site Collector. {{ cpos }}

fields.message: You are registered as a Site Collector.  {{ cpos }}
fields.description: Response for the 'who' command when a user is registered as a CPO.

fields.message_rw: Wanditswe nka umukozi wikigo gifasha mubya kawa cyangwa umushoramari  {{ csp.csp.name }}.
fields.message_en_us: You are registered as an officer for {{ csp.csp.name }}.
fields.message: You are registered as an officer for {{ csp.csp.name }}.
fields.description: Response to the 'who' command when the user is registered as a CSP officer.

fields.message_rw: Wanditswe nk'indorerezi y'uruganda rwa {{ obs.wetmill.name }} .
fields.message_en_us: You are registered as an observer of the {{ obs.wetmill.name }} wet mill.
fields.message: You are registered as an observer of the {{ obs.wetmill.name }} wet mill.
fields.description: Response to the 'who' command when a user is registered as a wet mill observer.

fields.message_rw: Ntabutumwa bwoherejwe mbere bwoguhagarika bwabonetse.
fields.message_en_us: No previous submission was found to cancel.
fields.message: No previous submission was found to cancel.
fields.description: Error message sent when no message was found to cancel.

fields.message_rw: Ntabwo yashoboye kubona ibitumbwe byagemuwe ku {{ wetmill.name }} by'ikirundo cyumunsi: {{ dlid }}  Nyamuneka genzura numero y'ikirundo cyawe y'umunsi.

fields.message: Unable to find any cherry delivered to {{ wetmill.name }} for the daylot: {{ dlid }}. Please check your daylot id.
fields.description: Error response when a user sends a 'store' command with a day lot id that had no cherry delivery.

fields.message_rw: Ntabwo yashoboye kubona inyandiko yemerera imodoka ifite pulaki gutwara kawa : {{ license }}

fields.message: Unable to find a shipping record for license plate: {{ license }}
fields.description: Error response when a no shipping record was sent with the same license plate number.

fields.message_rw: Numero y'Ikirundo cy'umunsi iteye gutya: DD.MM.YY, urugero: 23.02.11  yari: {{ value }}

fields.message: Day lot id must be in the format: DD.MM.YY, ie: 23.02.11  was: {{ value }}
fields.description: Error response when a user sends a daylot id that isn't in the format DD.MM.YY

fields.message_rw: Umushoramari yakiriye {{ pakg }} ibiro bya kawa A mu mufuka {{ pab }} n'ibiro {{ pbkg }} bya kawa b mu mifuka {{ pbb }} ku modoka {{ license }}. Ubutohe bungana na {{ moisture }}% na manota gusogo {{ score }}. Nomero yemeza: {{ confirmation_id }}
fields.message_en_us: Your CSP received {{ pakg }} kg of Parchment A in {{ pab }} bags and {{ pbkg }} of Parchment B in {{ pbb }} bags on vehicle {{ license }}. The moisture content is {{ moisture }}% and the cupping score is {{ score }}. Confirmation id: {{ confirmation_id }}
fields.message: Your CSP received {{ pakg }} kg of Parchment A in {{ pab }} bags and {{ pbkg }} of Parchment B in {{ pbb }} bags on vehicle {{ license }}. The moisture content is {{ moisture }}% and the cupping score is {{ score }}. Confirmation id: {{ confirmation_id }}

fields.message_rw: {{ acc.wetmill.name }} wohereje {{ pakg }} ibiro bya kawa A mu {{ pab }} mumifuka {{ pbkg }} ibiro by'ikawa B mu {{ pbb }} imifuka kumodoka {{ license }}. Ubutumwa bwemeza: {{ confirmation_id }}

fields.message: {{ acc.wetmill.name }} sent {{ pakg }} kg of Parchment A in {{ pab }} bags and {{ pbkg }} kg of Parchment B in {{ pbb }} bags on vehicle {{ license }}.  Confirmation id: {{ confirmation_id }}

fields.message_rw: Hagemuwe: {{ cherry }} kg. kashi isigye: {{ cash_b }} RFW.Umwenda usigaye: {{ credit_b }} RFW.ibura: {{ missing_cv }}RFW. Ubutumwa bwemeza: {{ confirmation_id|codify:"CH" }}.

fields.message: Cherry Delivered: {{ cherry }} kg. Cash balance: {{ cash_b }} RWF. Credit balance: {{ credit_b }} RWF. Missing Coffee: {{ missing_cv }} RWF. Confirmation Id: {{ confirmation_id|codify:"CH" }}
